about_the_game:
Welcome to "Little World," a strategic game that blends magical elements with deep strategic gameplay. In this version, you will get a first glimpse of our unique game mechanics, including an innovative combination of tower defense and auto chess.

Game Features:

Hero Development: Choose and cultivate heroes from mythological tales, each with unique skills and growth paths. Customize the development of your heroes' abilities based on battle needs and personal preferences.

Strategic Depth: This game requires you to thoughtfully select hero combinations and tactical deployments. Make precise strategic decisions based on the tactics of your opponents and the conditions on the battlefield to ensure victory.

Diverse Game Modes: Offering multiplayer online battles and challenging solo quests, it caters to various player needs with different challenges and fun.

Rich Bond Combinations: Carefully select hero combinations that activate specific bond effects, gaining combat bonuses or special effects to enhance your combat effectiveness and tactical diversity.

Clever Pet Skills: Pets in the game are not only loyal companions but also possess unique combat skills. Using pet skills correctly at critical moments can change the course of the battle and even turn a defeat into a victory.
"Little World" is not only a challenge for your strategic thinking but also a test of your creativity. In this magical world, wisdom and courage will lead you to victory.

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, some monsters and heroes will be scantily clad, and battles will depict some gore and violence.
